title: OPPO Find X5 5G and Find X5 Lite fully detailed in a massive leak
content:
Last week, a massive leak revealed pretty much everything about the OPPO Find X5 Pro, including its renders and full specifications. Now a fresh leak has fully detailed the other two models in the Find X5 series: the Find X5 5G and Find X5 Lite. WinFuture has published high-quality renders, and complete specifications of the

The post OPPO Find X5 5G and Find X5 Lite fully detailed in a massive leak appeared first on xda-developers.
description: High-quality renders and complete specifications of the regular OPPO Find X5 5G and Find X5 Lite have leaked.
